summary: Iteration 10: Complete testing of entity CRUD APIs (Teams, Leagues, Brands, Players), migration endpoint, autocomplete, entity pages, Navbar Database dropdown, and Topkit branding. All 28 backend tests passed. Frontend entity pages working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/teams - list teams with search and country filter ✓
Backend: GET /api/teams/{id} - get team by ID or slug with kit count and kits list ✓
Backend: GET /api/leagues/{id} - get league by ID ✓
Backend: GET /api/brands/{id} - get brand by ID ✓
Backend: GET /api/players/{id} - get player by ID ✓
Backend: Duplicate team creation correctly rejected with 400 ✓
Backend: Browse page data (GET /api/master-kits) still works ✓
Frontend: Landing page shows Topkit logo and branding ✓
Frontend: Database dropdown has Teams, Leagues, Brands, Players links ✓
Frontend: /teams page renders with 14 teams and search bar ✓
Frontend: /teams search filters teams correctly (Barcelona filter works) ✓
Frontend: /teams/fc-barcelona shows team detail with 21 kits grid and filters ✓
Frontend: /players page renders with 2 players (Messi + test player) ✓
Frontend: /browse page still works correctly (170 kits) ✓
Frontend: AddJersey.js has EntityAutocomplete for Team, Brand, League fields ✓
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: Console warnings about span inside option/select elements in Teams.js country filter - caused by some wrapper but not affecting functionality
seed_data_creation: Test data created during backend tests with TEST_ prefix for teams, leagues, brands, players
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 10 features fully verified: (1) Entity CRUD APIs for Teams, Leagues, Brands, Players - all working with search, filters, detail views with kits lists. (2) Entity autocomplete endpoint (type=team/brand/league/player) working. Legacy field-based autocomplete still works. (3) Migration endpoint idempotent. (4) Frontend entity pages: /teams (14 teams), /leagues (6 leagues), /brands (8 brands), /players (2 players). Team detail shows kits grid with season/type/brand filters. (5) Navbar has Database dropdown with entity links. (6) Topkit branding in Landing page and Navbar. (7) AddJersey has EntityAutocomplete for Team, Brand, League. (8) Browse page still works (170 kits). No mocked APIs.
